Hi all,
=A0I am currently making a suit of tatami/karutakane armor (my firs=
t suit of armor), and I was wondering if I could get any tips or cool photo=
s of various sengoku armor pieces. I am basing mine off of a suit from the =
Osaka castle museum (as seen on page 128 of Samurai, by Mitsuo Kure), and i=
t is in a haramaki-do style. I especially want to ask Anthony J. Bryant-who=
se website has helped immensely-some questions about plate thicknes, that i=
s if anyone knows how to contact him.
